name: Driver Nephi
descriptions: Driver Nephi is a leading member of the Fiends, second only to Motor-Runner, in the Mojave Wasteland in 2281.
Nephi was originally a member of the Mormons from New Canaan in Utah.

Within the Fiends, Nephi gained the moniker of "Driver Nephi." This comes from his signature weapon, a golf driver, with which he has taken the lives of over a dozen armed NCR troopers in melee combat. According to Major Dhatri, Nephi has had numerous run-ins with First Recon, who have yet to succeed in killing him even after multiple attempts, as Nephi tends to use his own men as meat shields and has proven tough enough to have survived multiple assassination attempts despite First Recon having more than one kill report.

Like many Fiends, Nephi has dabbled in the slave trade, doing business with Dermot and Saint James in Westside on at least one occasion. It was Nephi that purchased the little girl and her family that went missing from Aerotech Office Park leading to Captain Parker starting an investigation, in which he paid 400 caps for the little girl's sister and 150 for her brother. He only paid 50 for the little girl herself, however, despite Dermot's best efforts to convince him to pay more and to wait until the girl got older.

By 2281, Nephi and his band of Fiends have made their camp in a burned-out building north of the Samson rock crushing plant, and south of the South Vegas ruins' east entrance, where they harass the NCR garrison at Camp McCarran.
Xbox 360 Driver Nephi is not marked as a respawning non-player character in the GECK, but scripting issues may rarely cause him to respawn some time after killing him.
